If Unity can handle KSP now, and FPS engine CryEngine is a base for Star Citizen, I`m pretty sure that some talented devs could do a space game on Unreal 4.

As for Identity - I had no idea about it, but I`m not a fan of "life sim" type of games so its not for me I guess.

I have tried Altis Life a few times and it's... well, I'm glad it's free. Someone must like that type of game I guess, because they keep getting made.

You can make whatever game you like in the big engines, limited somewhat by the skill of the devs. Perhaps this year we'll see someone make a close copy of KSP. It's a genre that needs more than one game in it.
